vote.text: Amendment SA 4230 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4230 proposed by Senator Rounds for Senator Schatz. (consideration: CR S3228; text: CR S3228) To amend the preamble.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4230 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
